argument.name: C
argument.description: Return type. The email address for a user, if any.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: Optional. The user name for which the email address is to be retrieved. If no user name is used then the email address for the current user will be retrieved.

page.description: Gets the email address of the specified user.
page.discussion: Context.Security.GetEmail() gets the email address of the specified user, or when no user is specified, gets the email address of the current user. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
